LanguageData.CommandAddDangerZoneDesc: 创建辐射危险半径以外的区域。
LanguageData.ImpassableDoor: 如果两侧有支撑结构，并且门前没有阻挡物，则可以放置门。
LanguageData.LookDiscA: 我们找到了飞船残骸的位置，或许还有生还的宇航员。
LanguageData.DamagedTent: 部署损坏的帐篷。有些墙可能不见了。
LanguageData.TentPlacementBlocked: 帐篷部署进程被某些物品、任务或者建筑所中断。请将帐篷部署在空旷的开阔地！
LanguageData.TentPlacementBlockedTree: 帐篷部署进程被某些树木中断。请将帐篷部署在空旷的开阔地！
LanguageData.TentPlacementBlockedSimple: 帐篷部署进程被中断。请将帐篷部署在空旷的开阔地！
LanguageData.CantPlaceTent: 不能部署一个完全损坏的帐篷。
LanguageData.WarnAboutRestart: 切换语言后，强烈建议你重启游戏。你可以选择不同的语言，但是在开始一个新存档或者读取一个存档前，请重启游戏。 \n \ n 否者，你将可能在游戏过程中遇到一些错误！
LanguageData.RL_CannotChangeMod: 无法改变模式, rod 仍然在放电。
LanguageData.RL_PowerSavingMode: 节能模式(点击改变模式): 闲置时不消耗能量，被击中时释放大量能量，但是仅有
LanguageData.RL_ChanceToAttract: 的几率吸引闪电和冷却。
LanguageData.RL_NormalMode: 普通模式(点击改变模式): 空闲时消耗少量能源，能够在风暴中输出足够的能量来维持自身，并有100%的几率吸引到闪电。 有
LanguageData.RL_ChanceOverwhelmed: 的几率在被覆盖时吸引到闪电。
LanguageData.RL_FastCooldown: 快速冷却模式(点击改变模式): 消耗3倍于普通模式的电量来达到4倍的冷却速度。100% 的几率吸引到闪电。能吸引闪电于
LanguageData.OneTradingSpotMessage: 地图上只能设置一个交易点。自动移除旧交易点。
LanguageData.HungryFlockText: A pack of the hungry critters appeared nearby and they're out for blood! You can try hunting them, or hide, as you prefer. They'll leave the area in a few days。
LanguageData.DevourersCropsText: Some particularly hungry devourers of crops have made their way into your garden! They'll likely hang around and keep eating your crops (and other plants) until you deal with them。
LanguageData.MoonFallMessageMeteorSwarm: A swarm of meteors -- possibly smaller pieces of your ship -- crosses the sky, burning up in the atmosphere。
LanguageData.MoonFallMessageMeteorSwarmTribal: A swarm of meteors flame across the sky, but none crash to the ground near you。
LanguageData.SkyFallMeteorite: A lump of {0} just crashed to the ground. It was presumably once part of your ship, but the forces that ripped the ship apart, followed by the heat of uncontrolled reentry, have left nothing but a misshapen mass。
LanguageData.MoonFallMeteoriteTribal: A large meteorite has struck ground in the area. It has left behind a lump of {0}。
LanguageData.MoonFallFlashstorm: Ionization in the atmosphere from the recent cascade of ship chunks and meteorites has caused a localized flashstorm. This can cause massive fires。
LanguageData.MoonFallFlashstormTribal: The gods are angry again, but instead of hurling rocks, they now hurl lightning. A flashstorm has begun. Beware of fires。
LanguageData.SkyFallRefugeePodCrash: You've detected an escape pod crashing hard nearby.\n\nThe occupant is an old acquaintance from your ship, who's agreed to join you。
